divs: Sighting DetailsMy wife and i were out doing yard work saturday Aug 10 about 900 pm when inoticed an object as brite as venus traveling from the south west travelingnortheast. we both witnessed this object. the next night Aug 11 we decided tohave a campfire and watch for ufos.I had my camcorder and filmed an object as itflew completly silent with no visable marker lights. it travel from the west tothe east. I watched the skys for the next three nights and shot some more videoof the same object thee nights later on the 14th . the sky on all the night wereclear with no clouds. we live in a rural setting with no sound or lightpollution. It defintly not a satilte as we see many of them. All though ithought it might be the space station but i should have seen it between the twovideos that i shot.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Fairview
This sighting has never been favorited.
